message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000.  This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. How about $1150000?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $1150000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1250000. This is still a good price for you considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $1200000.
